reviews.review: Co-op can be either extremely vile or extremely fun, there is no inbetween
Love the feeling when ur friend did all the work and only thing u do is being usless. 10/10 best game
Funny and engaging plot. Great physics puzzles. Several days of fun playtime (couple hours a day).

is very fun and i completed it

Portal 2 is another amazing game. The music in this game is amazing, just like Portal 1. The visuals are good too, if you want some good lore, pick this game up! The concept is still the same as Portal 1 (obviously), but its still a great game. I remember playing this on the XBOX 360. Good times.
me parece un juego entrenido en todo le daria un 9 de 10
Okay I am not even going to TRY to lie. This is seriously one of the best games of all time. It's so much fun.
If you want to bring someone into gaming. You start here

Игра классная.Очень хорошо, что до сих пор держится хоть в каком-то  топе.
 Из + могу сказать что если хочешь играть в КООП, но нет друзей то ты всегда можешь поиграть с рандомным человеком.Очень хорошая детализация и классная история.Песня в концу просто топ.
Bu oyunu yıllar önce oynadım ve bitirdim sonra tekrar tekrar oynadım evde şuan pc yok alınca multiplayer özelliği ilede oynamayı düşünüyorum gerçek anlamda çocuklarınıza oynatın
This game is the best game I've ever played, aside from Halo. I've been a fan of this game ever since Portal hit the Xbox 360 on the Orange box. Very great game! Hope three comes out at some point!
It's very fun and stimulating.. it can definitely spark some arguments among friends playing
10/10 it's awesome. You have to play it and it's 10 bucks so get it

当时家附近有一个网吧叫红客，老板长的很凶，像弩哥，我便叫他弩哥。
      老板人很好，我每次叫他下游戏，他都会帮我下载；有时候不知道我说的游戏，就让我自己去主机下载；我在这个网吧玩过很多游戏（当时都是盗版）。
      大一寒假，临近元宵；与喜欢的人身隔两地，越好了一起开黑LOL。
     “晚上还玩LOL吗？”
    “好啊，晚上我喊你，要带我赢哦”
     “没问题，我把我兄弟带上，包赢！”
     我使出浑身解数利诱兄弟陪我去网吧通宵。
     可我等了一整晚，她也没有来，也没有消息。似乎我知道些，似乎我又不知道。
     拒绝了兄弟叫我LOL，心不在焉玩了一晚上的传送门。   
     后来，我和她也少了联系；再后来，网吧变成了茶馆，我不知道是拆了还是换地方了；
     对了，网吧叫红客，老板长的凶，像弩哥，我便叫他弩哥。
alınmaya değer bir oyun ve portal serisisnin birmesi üzdü

Лучшая игра за свои деньги.Как по мне этот проект почти что самый лучший у Valve.
-Интересный сюжет-
-Шутки про родителей-
-Поучительная история-
-Лучшая песенка в конце-
Однозначно да.

The sequel to Portal  ( https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198324336566/recommended/400 ) , this was insane for me with  being released in 2011, only four years since Portal's release, compared to Half-Life 2's release almost twenty years since Half-Life's release!

It is Portal 2. No further information required.

Wahnsinn, wie alt das Game ist (2011), oder wie alt ich geworden bin *lol* und es ist immer noch zu empfehlen. Die damalige Grafik braucht sich vor so manchem aktuellem AAA-Titel nicht zu verstecken und ist heute noch als sehr 
schön zu bezeichnen. Der zweite Teil konnte hier nochmal einen oben draufsetzen.

Was ich aber besonders liebe an Portal 2, ist der Humor von GLaDOS & Wheatley.

Absoluter Klassiker und Meisterwerk, was Valve da abgeliefert hat.
